Rulings.Cat:
● 'Doomkaiser Dragon's' effect targets 1 Zombie, both in your opponent's GY and while it is on the field.
● Destroying the Special Summoned Zombie when 'Doomkaiser Dragon' leaves the field does not start a Chain.
● If an effect is chained that flips 'Doomkaiser Dragon' face-down, the targeted Zombie is still Special Summoned and it is no longer targeted by 'Doomkaiser Dragon' while on the field.
Rulings.TeleDAD:
● 'Doomkaiser Dragon's' effect targets 1 Zombie, both in your opponent's GY and while it is on the field.
● Destroying the Special Summoned Zombie when 'Doomkaiser Dragon' leaves the field does not start a Chain.
● If an effect is chained that flips 'Doomkaiser Dragon' face-down, the targeted Zombie is still Special Summoned and it is no longer targeted by 'Doomkaiser Dragon' while on the field.

Rulings.Base: 1. The effect of "Doomkaiser Dragon" targets 1 Zombie-Type monster, both in your opponent's GY and while it is on the field.\n2. Destroying the Special Summoned Zombie-Type monster when "Doomkaiser Dragon" is removed from the field does not start a Chain.\n3. If an effect is chained that flips "Doomkaiser Dragon" face-down, the targeted Zombie-Type monster is still Special Summoned and it is no longer targeted by "Doomkaiser Dragon" while on the field.

PSCT.Edison:
Plaguespreader Zombie" + 1 or more non-Tuner Zombies
① When Special Summoned: You can target 1 Zombie in your opponent's GY; Special Summon that target to your field in Attack Position (destroy it if this card leaves the field).
